name: Chicken Curry
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken with spices.
2. Fry onions until golden.
3. Add tomatoes and cook till soft.
4. Add chicken and simmer.
5. Serve hot with rice.

name: Grilled Fish
instructions:
1. Marinate fish with lemon and garlic.
2. Grill until golden.
3. Serve with chutney or salad.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions:
1. Fry paneer cubes.
2. Make tomato gravy.
3. Add butter, cream, and simmer with paneer.

name: Veg Biryani
instructions:
1. Cook vegetables with spices.
2. Layer with rice.
3. Steam and serve hot.

name: Egg Curry
instructions:
1. Boil eggs.
2. Fry onions and tomatoes.
3. Add spices and eggs.
4. Simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Aloo Paratha
instructions:
1. Make aloo stuffing.
2. Fill in dough.
3. Roast with ghee.

name: Palak Paneer
instructions:
1. Blanch spinach.
2. Make puree and cook with paneer and spices.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions:
1. Grill marinated chicken.
2. Cook in buttery tomato gravy.
3. Add cream and simmer.

name: Chole Bhature
instructions:
1. Cook chole masala.
2. Fry bhature.
3. Serve hot.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
instructions:
1. Cook mutton with spices.
2. Add yogurt gravy.
3. Simmer till tender.

name: Masala Dosa
instructions:
1. Make dosa batter.
2. Prepare aloo filling.
3. Cook and stuff dosas.

name: Fish Fry
instructions:
1. Marinate fish.
2. Coat with flour.
3. Deep fry till golden.

name: Mix Veg Curry
instructions:
1. Saut√© veggies.
2. Cook gravy and combine.
3. Serve with rice or roti.

name: Tandoori Chicken
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt mix.
2. Bake or grill.
3. Serve with onions.

name: Dal Tadka
instructions:
1. Boil dal.
2. Make tadka.
3. Combine and serve hot.
